text: was a Japanese voice actor. His best known works were Shinnosuke's father Hiroshi Nohara in the long-running anime series Crayon Shin-chan, Maes Hughes in Fullmetal Alchemist, Holland in Eureka Seven, Axel in Kingdom Hearts, Leorio in Hunter x Hunter, Shiro Fujimoto in Ao no Exorcist and Esidisi in JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Battle Tendency. In the live action, he was mostly known for dubbing actor Robert Downey Jr. as Iron Man/Tony Stark. Fujiwara died, aged 55 of cancer on April 12, 2020. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Japan Category:Japanese voice actors Category:Actors from Tokyo
title: Keiji Fujiwara
